# flake8

Lightweight tool focused on PEP-8 style, basic errors, and code complexity.

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

from buttons import generate_html

html = generate_html(
    pypi_url="https://pypi.org/project/flake8/",
    github_url="https://github.com/pycqa/flake8",
    conda_url="https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/flake8",
    include_conda=True
)
print(html)
```

<br>

Example Quarto `.qmd` file with errors to be identified by flake8:

```{.qmd}
---
title: "Flake8 example"
---

This is ignored

```{.python}
very_long_line = "This long string exceeds the maximum allowed characters per line."
```

x=1+2
```

<br>

Run flake8 using `lintquarto`:

```{.bash}
lintquarto flake8 file.qmd
```
